In #3852:
```
$ git fetch origin origin pull/3852/head && git checkout FETCH_HEAD
$ spack install quinoa ^openmpi
==> Error: Invalid spec: 'charm@6.7.1%gcc@6.3.0 backend=mpi ~papi+shared+smp~tcp arch=linux-gentoo2-x86_64'. Package charm requires variant backend=mpi, but spec asked for backend=mpi
```
"Package X requires variant A=B, but spec asked for A=B", huh?
title: Package charm requires variant backend=mpi, but spec asked for backend=mpi
